name: Snow Plow Rescue Train Driving 3D Simulator
name_original: Snow Plow Rescue Train Driving 3D Simulator
description:
Extreme winter is here and due to heavy snowfall, the metro rail traffic is blocked. Passengers are waiting at railway station to travel to their home for Christmas holidays. Play as Snow Plow Rescue Train Driver and clear the frozen railroad tracks from tons of ice.

Passengers are stuck at subway station because train driver cannot control locomotive on icy tracks. Santa claus is delivering gifts for favorite kids on cargo train but due winter snow all rail transport is closed. Take charge as train driver and help Santa and citizens to visit their destinations in holidays. Hop in the driver cabin and control giant metro train. Operate giant cranes to load cargo containers, animals and heavy freight on the passenger train. Honk the air horn and leave arctic empire while driving the snowplow bullet train. Enjoy fascinating sights and drive through snowy mountains. Control speed near sharp turns and save locomotives to derail from rail road. Reach other cities and towns within time and prevent citizens from enjoying Christmas without family.

Become a train tycoon in real simulation game and do your duty as driver and crane operator at railway station. Stop at other city and unload xmas gifts and freight container on subway platform using cargo crane. Modern trains come with special snow plough machine attached to its front. Drive advanced trains to clear railway tracks frozen with tons of ice snow and help travellers reach their homes for winter xmas holidays.

Game Features:
10 exciting and challenging snowplow and animal transport missions on metro rails
Choose from multiple trainz like electric, steam and turbo diesel engine
Work as crane operator for managing cargo transportation
Explore fascinating snowy hills and realistic mountains outside city area
Smooth touch controls for realistic driving experience
High quality 3D graphics with amazing details

Download Snow Plow Rescue Train Driving, the newest 3D simulator game for endless fun and adventures in snowy hills.
